definitions.title: Hithp.
definitions.body: engage in strife (cf. NH Pi. stir up, excite, against ([[בְּ]]) Hithp.; Aram. Pa. [[גׇּרֵא]] gariy; esp. As. garû, Qal attack, be at war with, garû, giṙû, enemy, etc. Asrb:Annals iv. 49, 50 (KB:ii. 190) also SASmith:Asrb. i. ii. Gloss.; Ar. jaray is run, esp. of water, flow, etc.)—

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: Impf. 3 ms. [[יְגׇרֶה]] Pr 15:18, Pr 28:25, Pr 29:22, all c. obj. [[מָדוֹן]] excite, stir up, strife.—On [[גֵּרָה]] De 14:8 v. I. [[גֵּרָה]] sub [[גרר]].

excite oneself against ([[בְּ]] pers.), engage in strife with, lit. De 2:5, De 2:19, 2Ki 14:19 = 2Ch 25:19 (sq. [[בְּרָעָה]];—[[רעה]] personif. as challenged opponent); also + acc. of manner, [[מִלְחָמָה]] De 2:9, De 2:24; fig. [[וְשׁׂמְרֵי תוֹרָה יִתְגׇּרוּ]] [[בָם]] Pr 28:4 while they that keep the law are at strife with them, i.e. with those that forsake it.

abs., excite oneself (against foe), wage war, only Da 11: [[יִתְגׇּרוּ וְאָֽסְפוּ הֲמוֹן חֲיׇלִים רַבִּים]] v:Da 11:10 they shall wage war, etc.; [[וְיׇשׁׂב וְיִתְגׇּרֶ֠ו עַד־מָעֻזּׁה]] v:Da 11:10 and he shall return and war, even to his stronghold; v:Da 11:25 sq. [[לַמִּלְחָמָה]] + [[בְּחַיִל גׇּדוֹל]] (instr.)
